Sena Sahin

A graduate of South Texas College of Law Houston, Sena Sahin is a skilled attorney providing strategic legal counsel in civil litigation, corporate advisory, and data privacy. Licensed in Washington, D.C., Pennsylvania, and Texas, she guides clients through complex disputes and regulatory landscapes with clarity and precision.

Business & Corporate Law

Counsels businesses of all sizes on contracts, compliance, risk management, and privacy, ensuring smooth operations and proactive legal strategies.

Litigation

Defends clients in high-stakes civil litigation, including personal injury, premises liability, and professional liability cases, achieving strategic resolutions.

Data Privacy

A Certified Information Privacy Professional (CIPP/US), she counsels organizations on data privacy, cybersecurity, and compliance with U.S. privacy laws including HIPAA, GLBA, and evolving state regulations.

A seasoned attorney with over 20 years of legal experience, he provides strategic legal counsel in estate planning, commercial real estate, and healthcare compliance. Licensed in Virginia and Washington, D.C., he advises individuals, businesses, and healthcare organizations on complex legal matters.

Business & Estate Planning

Advises clients on wills, trusts, partnerships, and entity formation. Offers comprehensive guidance on succession planning and risk management for businesses and families.

Get the Legal Representation You Deserve Today

Step 1: Fill Out The Contact Us Form

Start by providing us with details about your legal concerns through our contact form. Our team will review your inquiry and connect you with the right legal expert.

Step 2: Schedule a Free Evaluation

If your case requires a more detailed pre-evaluation, please fill out our free evaluation form. Our legal team will carefully review the information provided and may contact you for additional details or documentation to ensure a thorough understanding of your situation.

Step 3: Book a Consultation

Meet with our experienced attorneys for a personalized consultation. Whether you need assistance with corporate law, litigation, immigration, or estate planning, weâ€™ll guide you through your legal options.

Ready!

With a clear legal strategy in place, you're on your way to resolving your case with confidence. Our team will be by your side every step of the way.

Apply for a US Visa As a Healthcare Professionals

Foreign doctors, nurses, and healthcare professionals can work in the U.S. through visa sponsorship, credential verification, and state licensing. Capitol Law Partners offers legal guidance throughout this process.

WhatÂ Is Form I-485? HowÂ toÂ Complete? Step-by-Step

This guide explains how to accurately complete Form I-485 using clear, practical steps adapted from real applicant experiences. It highlights the strict requirement to enter information exactly as shown on your passport, use only English letters, and disclose any additional citizenships or prior immigration filings.

Ways to Get a Green Card in the United StatesÂ 

There are multiple ways to get a Green Card: family sponsorship (parents, siblings, fiancÃ©(e)/spouse), employment-based visas (EB categories), the Diversity Visa Lottery, and other special programs. Capitol Law Partners helps clients choose the best path and provides legal support to achieve permanent residency.

This article provides a practical overview of Intellectual Property (IP) law in the United States, explaining how patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets safeguard innovation. It also highlights current debates around artificial intelligence and intellectual property, offering guidance for businesses and creators seeking legal protection.Â
